actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide separation pay for regular enlisted members of the United States armed forces.

summary.text: Entitles enlisted members of an armed force who have five years or more, but less than 20 years, of creditable service, and who are involuntarily discharged or denied reenlistment, to severance pay. Sets forth the method for computing such pay.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide separation pay for regular enlisted members of the United States armed forces.
